title: AI is key driver behind layoffs at fintech company Block, CEO says
description: Shares in the financial technology company Block soared more than 20% in premarket trading Friday after its CEO announced it was laying off more than 4,000 of its 10,000 plus employees, reconfiguring to capitalize on its use of artificial intelligence.
content: BANGKOK (AP) — Shares in the financial technology company Block soared more than 20% in premarket trading Friday after its CEO announced it was laying off more than 4,000 of its 10,000 plus employees, reconfiguring to capitalize on its use of artific... [2091 chars]

title: Dorsey's blunt AI warning sharpens debate over jobs and profits
description: Jack Dorsey is not the first chief executive to say artificial intelligence will transform work. He may be among the first to act as if it already has - and to say so openly.
content:

title: Gov. Shapiro discusses AI regulation in schools during Carnegie visit
description: High school students are increasingly turning to artificial intelligence for homework help, advice and even companionship — leaving school administrators wondering where to draw the line. title: New 50m pool opens at Arena Joondalup as part of $13m upgrade
description: In addition to the new 50m pool, the facility now also features artificial intelligence-powered drowning detection technology, which previously helped save a swimmer’s life at another Perth leisure centre.
content:
Swimmers got their first look on Friday at the new 50m lap pool at Arena Joondalup, with a $13 million upgrade to the venue’s aquatic facilities now officially open.
The new state-of-the-art facility took just over 12 months to complete and has been ... [2386 chars]

title: India world's fastest-growing major economy: Canadian PM Carney after landing in Mumbai
description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is in India for a four-day visit. He aims to build strong partnerships in trade, energy, technology, and artificial intelligence. Carney met with business leaders in Mumbai. He will hold talks with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi. This visit seeks to boost bilateral ties between the two nations.
content:
